name: TC1351-01 - Successful Report Submission by User.
description: LMS-1351 Возможность для юзера отправлять репорты. https://app.qase.io/case/LMS-1351Objective: To validate that users can report problems successfully by initiating the 'Report a Problem' function.

steps.name: Precondition: Start random domain test with 1 question(s).
Click 'Cansel' button to cancel dialog if visible.
Click 'Generate and Start' button to start the Tutor test.
Assert that 'Report a Problem' modal window is visible.
Assert that the report message is visible.
